Name: Sample Browser - by All-In-One Code Framework
Description:
[image:http://i3.codeplex.com/Images/v19430/RuntimeBinary.gif] *[url:Install Sample Browser Visual Studio Extension|http://aka.ms/samplebrowservsx]*
 
[image:http://i1.visualstudiogallery.msdn.s-msft.com/4934b087-e6cc-44dd-b992-a71f00a2a6df/image/file/82553/1/samplebrowserscreenshots.png]
 
 
 
!! Sample Browser Gets a Big Refresh with Expansion to 3500+ code samples, Favorite Searches, Enriched Query Conditions & More

*Detailed Introduction: 
[url:http://blogs.msdn.com/b/codefx/archive/2012/04/16/samplebrowserbigrefresh.aspx] *
 
[image:http://i3.codeplex.com/Download?ProjectName=1code&DownloadId=368189]
 
[image:http://i3.codeplex.com/Download?ProjectName=1code&DownloadId=368197]


!!! New Features

* Expansion to *3500+* code samples
: The new Sample Browser is expanded to search and download over *3500* samples - including *800{"+"}* Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework samples, *480{"+"}* Windows 8 Beta samples, 600{"+"} Windows Forms, ASP.NET, Silverlight and WPF samples, and a lot more. 

* Favorite Samples and Favorite Searches
* Support of English, Japanese and Simplified Chinese
* Social Media Integration
* Localized search experience
* Flexibility in downloading and managing samples
* Enriched Sample Query Conditions
* Over 20 other new features, performance improvement, and bug fixes

Name: C++, .NET Coding Guideline
Description:
!! Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Coding Guideline

This document describes the coding style guideline for native C++ and .NET (C# and VB.NET) programming used by the Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework project team.

Description:

Name: All-In-One Code Framework Sample Browser
Description:
[image:http://download.codeplex.com/Download?ProjectName=1code&DownloadId=288354]

*Introduction*: [url:http://samplebrowserhelp]

!!! Visual Studio Extension of the Sample Browser is released too!
Install: [url:http://aka.ms/samplebrowservsx]
You can search and download code samples from within Visual Studio 2010.

[image:http://i1.visualstudiogallery.msdn.s-msft.com/4934b087-e6cc-44dd-b992-a71f00a2a6df/image/file/59259/1/screenshot1.png]

Name: Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Browser
Description:
[image:http://download.codeplex.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=1code&DownloadId=228028]

!! Key features of Sample Browser v3
*1. "on-demand" sample downloading*
The Sample Browser is a small and easy-to-install application. It searches for Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework code samples.  Based on your demands, you have the flexible choice between downloading individual code sample by clicking the “Download” button next to the code sample, 

[image:http://download.codeplex.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=1code&DownloadId=228032]

and downloading all code samples in one click. 

[image:http://download.codeplex.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=1code&DownloadId=228034]

*2. Sample download management*

In Sample Browser v3,  you can configure the folder for managing all downloaded code samples. 

[image:http://download.codeplex.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=1code&DownloadId=228035]

We recommend that you download all code samples to a centralized place, e.g. "D:\Samples".  Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Browser will help you manage the downloaded code samples.  If a sample has already been downloaded, Sample Browser displays the “Open” button next to the code sample:

[image:http://download.codeplex.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=1code&DownloadId=228036]

If an update becomes available for a code sample, a [Update Available] button will remind you to download the updated code sample. 

[image:http://download.codeplex.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=1code&DownloadId=228037]

*3. Auto-update*

Thanks to ClickOnce, you will automatically get updates of Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Browser when its new versions come out.

[image:http://download.codeplex.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=1code&DownloadId=228039]

Should you have any feedback, please feel free to let us know by sending email to us at here: [url:onecode@microsoft.com]. Your suggestions are very much appreciated.
